蓶字的基本解释

蓶
wéi
古书上说的一种菜。

蓶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wéi］
［《廣韻》以追切，平脂，以。］
［《廣韻》以水切，上旨，以。］
见“蓶扈”。

蓶字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蓶； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1052第31
【集韻】愈水切，音唯。【說文】菜也。【玉篇】似韭而黃。　又【直音】音維。義同。　又同芛。【後漢·馬融傳】蓶扈蘣熒。【郭璞註】草木花初生，與芛通。

蓶字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蓶字的起名意思

暂无。

Scorpion
wéi
A kind of dish mentioned in ancient books.
Scorpion
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wéi］
["Guang Yun" to chase cutting, flat fat, to. ]
["Guangyun" cuts with water, puts on the purpose, with. ]
See "Langhu".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Words] 　蓶; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1052 31
[Jiyun] The more water cuts, the sound is only. 【Said Wen】Cai Ye. 【Jade articles】It looks like leek but yellow.　[Straight tone] Yinwei. The same meaning.　 Same again. 【The Story of Ma Rong in the Later Han Dynasty】Lang Fu Ying Ying. [Guo Pu's Note] Plants, trees, and flowers are born, and they are connected with Qiangtong.
